vsParam:
[px], have you packed the medicine?
Don't forget apples. They're my snacks.

Ah, [px], I've heard of it,
Bergamot Sensei gave you an assignment?

Er, yes.
Sensei wants us to kill monsters and gather ingredients.

Hmm... But, fighting monsters is not the
strong suit of an alchemist, is it?

We guards are here
to do these things...
This is about finding out the properties of the materials.
We must do it to become the most powerful alchemist!

Yes. We go kill monsters and gather ingredients
just to figure out the properties of those ingredients.

I see... I didn't realize that alchemists also need
combat capability! OK, I must not lose to you guys!

Hey, what nonsense! We go hunt monsters and gather ingredients
on our own just because we want to understand those ingredients.

Alchemy is a technology that alters the properties of things.
So an alchemist must know ingredients' properties very well.

Ingredients come from monsters, so an alchemist must study their
properties by fighting monsters, especially during their school days.

Ah, uh, that's right!
Bergamot Sensei said the same thing!

For [px] to study
monsters' properties, I will do my utmost to assist you!

Will you... It sounds very nice, but don't make
[px] assist you when the time comes.

N-no such thing will happen. Ha-ha-ha!
Let's go kill some monsters!
